column4: What i must select in install proggres if i have 1 patrition with no type and wanna install ubuntu on it? Manual partitioning and then ?
just point it at the whole drive & use automatic
no couse if i do this format all partitions
please respec your hd layout
hm .. ? do you thing that? > 20 GB NTFS > 20 GB unused
well if it was me... 2gig = "/" 2 gig swap + 8 gig /usr + 8gig /home
can i pick up automaticly partitioning but only for 1 partition ?
not sure
install w32codecs
i have install it
totem should just work - you sure it's a totem plugin?
yes > ** (totem-mozilla-viewer:10743): CRITICAL **: bacon_video_widget_stop: assertion `bvw != NULL' failed
set the option in Synaptic to trash pkgs from cache not in repos

it's under "files"
settings -> prefs -> files
yes i see...which? 1,2,3 ? :P
if you just upgraded, probably just click "clear cache" and then select 3
ill do that when ill upgraded...
but your hoary pkgs were deleted when you changed repos, so just pick 3
don't sweat it - just upgrade & it all works
i just asking..
